data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, STATUS from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCaseRole1
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, HEALTH_INS_IND from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate)

data.name: ReadCaseRole2
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, HEALTH_INS_IND from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (END_DATE <= @endDate)

data.name: ReadCaseRole3
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, HEALTH_INS_IND from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb
